statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ -1 \\ -3 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ -3 \\ 2 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 13 \\ 12 \\ -19 \\ -14 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 29 \\ 36 \\ -35 \\ -22 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 89 \\ 101 \\ -115 \\ -77 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 71 \\ 84 \\ -89 \\ -58 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
